markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Caligni](/Traits.aspx?ID=210)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 345</row>

These subterranean people have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), and some have powers to create darkness.
name: Caligni
